onyomiExamples.meaning: on the desk, theoretical, academic, armchair (e.g. plan), desktop, paper, not yet implemented
word of respect added to the addressee's name on a letter, under the desk
dustless desk by a well-lit window, well-lit and clean study conducive to learning

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to sit at a desk (to study), to set to work on revision, homework, etc.
desk with a tier of drawers on one side
eight-legged table (used as a stand for religious offerings, etc.)
